## Sustainable Development Goals  


![](./SDGS.png)  
What proportion of the targets for each goal are ecological?

### Data

```{r, data, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_csv("data/goals_targets.csv")

count.data <-  data %>%
  group_by(item, discipline) %>%
  summarise(n = n())

discipline.p <- count.data %>%
  group_by(discipline) %>%
  mutate(proportion = n/sum(n))

ggplot(count.data, aes(item, n, fill = discipline)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")

library(skimr)
skim(count.data)

disciplines <- count.data %>%
  group_by(discipline) %>%
  summarise(n = sum(n), proportion = (n/168)*100)
  

ggplot(disciplines, aes(discipline, n)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")

ggplot(disciplines, aes(discipline, proportion)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")

ggplot(discipline.p, aes(discipline, proportion)) +
  geom_col()
```
